paragraphs.original: 话说赵姨娘正在屋里抱怨贾环，只听贾环在外间屋里发话道：“我不过弄倒了药銱子，潵了一点子药，那丫头又没就死了，值的他也骂我，你也骂我，赖我心坏，把我往死里糟蹋？等著，我明儿还要那小丫头子的命呢，看你们怎么著！只叫他们提防著就是了。”那赵姨娘赶忙从里间出来，握住他的嘴，说道：“你还只管信口胡吣，还叫人家先要了你的命呢！”娘儿两个吵了一回。赵姨娘听见凤姐的话，越想越气，也不著人来安慰凤姐一声儿。过了几天，巧姐儿也好了。因此，两边结怨比从前更加一层了。

paragraphs.original: 一日，林之孝进来回道：“今日是北静郡王生日，请老爷的示下。”贾政吩咐道：“只按向年旧例办了，回大老爷知道，送去就是了。”林之孝答应了，自去办理。

paragraphs.original: 正说著，小太监进来回道：“外面诸位大人老爷都在前殿谢王爷赏宴。”说著，呈上谢宴并请午安的片子来。北静王略看了看，仍递给小太监，笑了一笑，说道：“知道了，劳动他们。”那小太监又回道：“这贾宝玉，王爷单赏的饭预备了。”北静王便命那太监带了宝玉到一所极小巧精致的院里，派人陪著吃了饭，又过来谢了恩。北静王又说了些好话儿，忽然笑说道：“我前次见你那块玉倒有趣儿，回来说了个式样，叫他们也作了一块来。今日你来得正好，就给你带回去玩罢。”因命小太监取来，亲手递给宝玉。宝玉接过来捧著，又谢了，然后退出，－－北静王又命两个小太监跟出来，－－才同著贾赦等回来了。贾赦见过贾母便各自回去。
paragraphs.english: As they were talking, a little eunuch came in to report, "All the gentlemen are in the front hall to thank the prince for his banquet." Along with the invitation to the banquet and a note to wish everyone a good afternoon. The Prince of the North looked at them, then handed them to the little eunuch and laughed, "I understand, thank you." The little eunuch then returned and said, "Jia Bao has been given a separate meal prepared by the prince." The Prince of the North ordered the eunuch to take him to a very small and exquisite courtyard, where he was served a meal by someone, and then came to thank the prince. The Prince of the North said some kind words and then laughed, "I saw your jade pendant earlier and found it interesting. I had them make one with the same design. You came at just the right time, so I'll give it to you to play with." Then he ordered the eunuch to bring the jade pendant, which he gave to Jia Bao himself. Jia Bao accepted the pendant with both hands and thanked him, then left. The Prince of the North also ordered two eunuchs to accompany Jia Bao out, and then they all returned to Jia's residence. Jia met with his grandmother Jia Mous and then returned to his own room.
paragraphs.chinese: 他们正说著，小太监进来回说：“各位大人老爷都在前殿谢王爷赏宴。”一并呈上谢宴和请午安的片纸。北静王看过，交给小太监，笑着说：“知道了，麻烦他们了。”那小太监又回说：“这贾宝玉，王爷单赏的饭已经预备好了。”北静王便命那太监带了宝玉到一所极小巧精致的院里，派人陪着吃了饭，又过来谢了恩。北静王又说了些好话儿，忽然笑说道：“我前次见你那块玉倒有趣儿，回来说了个式样，叫他们也作了一块来。今日你来得正好，就给你带回去玩罢。”便命小太监取来，亲手递给宝玉。宝玉接过来捧著，又谢了，然后退出，－－北静王又命两个小太监跟出来，－－才同著贾赦等回来了。贾赦见过贾母便各自回去。

paragraphs.original: 这里贾政带著他三人请过了贾母的安，又说了些府里遇见什么人。宝玉又回了贾政，吴大人陛见保举的话。贾政道：“这吴大人，本来偺们相好，也是我辈中人，还倒是有骨气的。”又说了几句闲话儿，贾母便叫：“歇著去罢。”贾政退出，珍、琏、宝玉都跟到门口。贾政道：“你们都回去陪老太太坐著去罢。”说著便回房去。刚坐了一坐，只见一个小丫头回道：“外面林之孝请老爷回话。”说著，递上个红单帖来，写著吴巡抚的名字。贾政知道来拜，便叫小丫头叫林之孝进来。贾政出至廊檐下。林之孝进来问道：“今日巡抚吴大人来拜，奴才回了去了。再奴才还听见说，现今工部出了一个郎中缺，外头人和部里都吵嚷是老爷拟正呢。”贾政道：“瞧罢咧。”林之孝又回了几句话，才出去了。

Later, he told Jia Zheng about the recommendation of the Wuxing adult by Wu adult. Jia Zheng said, "This Wuxing adult is actually a good friend of ours and has integrity." Then they talked about some idle talk. After that, Jia Mother told them to take a break. Jia Zheng left, and Jia Chen, Jia Xing, and Jia Bao followed him to the door. Jia Zheng said, "You can go back and accompany Jia Mother to sit." Then he went back to his room. After sitting for a while, a little girl came to say that Lin Zhixiao was asking for Jia Zheng's leave. Jia Zheng asked Lin Zhixiao to come in. Jia Zheng went out to the corridor. Lin Zhixiao came in and asked, "The Wuxing adult from the military department came to visit today. I went to the palace. Besides, I heard that there is a vacancy for the post of Court Commissioner at the Ministry of Work. It is said that it is proposed by Jia Zheng." Jia Zheng said, "Let's see what happens." Lin Zhixiao then said a few more words before leaving.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政带着他三人给贾母请安，又说府里遇见什么人。宝玉又告诉贾政吴大人陛见保举的话。贾政道：“这吴大人，本来是咱们相好，也是我们中人，还倒是有骨气的。”又说了几句闲话儿，贾母便叫：“歇着去罢。”贾政退出，珍、琏、宝玉都跟到门口。贾政道：“你们都回去陪老太太坐着去罢。”说著便回房去。刚坐了一坐，只见一个小丫头回道：“外面林之孝请老爷回话。”说著，递上个红单帖来，写著吴巡抚的名字。贾政知道来拜，便叫小丫头叫林之孝进来。贾政出至廊檐下。林之孝进来问道：“今日巡抚吴大人来拜，奴才回了去了。再奴才还听见说，现今工部出了一个郎中缺，外头人和部里都吵嚷是老爷拟正呢。”贾政道：“瞧罢咧。”林之孝又回了几句话，才出去了。

paragraphs.original: 且说珍、琏、宝玉三人回去，独有宝玉到贾母那边，一面述说北静王待他的光景，并拿出那块玉来。大家看著笑了一回，贾母因命人：“给他收起去罢，别丢了。”因问：“你那块玉好生带著罢？别闹混了。”宝玉在项上摘下来，说：“这不是我那一块玉？那里就掉了呢！比起来，两块玉差远著呢，那里混得过？我正要告诉老太太：前儿晚上，我睡的时候，把玉摘下来挂在帐子里，他竟放起光来了，满帐子都是红的。”贾母说道：“又胡说了。帐子的檐子是红的，火光照著，自然红是有的。”宝玉道：“不是。那时候灯己灭了，屋里都漆黑的了，还看的见他呢。”邢王二夫人抿著嘴笑。凤姐道：“这是喜信发动了。”宝玉道：“什么喜信？”贾母道：“你不懂得。今儿个闹了一天，你去歇歇儿去罢，别在这里说呆话了。”宝玉又站了一会儿，才回园中去了。

Grandmother Jia said, "You're talking nonsense. The mosquito net is red, and the firelight makes it look red." Yuanyang said, "No. The lights were already out, and it was dark in the room, but I could still see it." The two ladies, Madame Zhen and Madame Wang, giggled. Madam Feng said, "This must be the sign of good luck." Yuanyang asked, "What good luck?" Grandmother Jia said, "You don't understand. Today has been a busy day, and you should go to bed now. paragraphs.original: 这里贾母问道：“正是，你们去看姨太太，说起这事没有？”王夫人道：“本来就要去看，因凤丫头为巧姐儿病著，耽搁了两天，今儿才去的。这事我们告诉了，他姨妈倒也十分愿意，只说蟠儿这时候不在家，目今他父亲没了，只得和他商量商量再办。”贾母道：“这也是情理的话。既这么样，大家先别提起，等姨太太那边商量定了再说。”
paragraphs.english:

Jia Mother asked, "Have you visited your Aunt? Did you mention this matter?" Wang Fufei replied, "We were planning to go, but since Feng Er's illness is on her mind, she couldn't go for two days. The next morning, when the ship arrived at Anqing, everyone woke up and saw that the river was covered in white. It turned out that there was a big snowstorm. The businessman was very happy and said, "This year will have a good harvest, and I can make a fortune of several thousand taels of silver. We all should thank the heavens!" He said this while the ship was already arriving in Nanjing.

paragraphs.english: Once, when Xisi came, she wanted to gauge the mood, sat for a while, but found nothing to say. She then realized that if she asked about the girl's feelings, she might provoke her anger, and decided not to do so. After sitting for a while, she decided to find an excuse to leave. As she was about to leave, she saw two people standing outside the door. She couldn't go through, so the one who saw her ran over to talk to her. When she saw that it was Fmiao, she asked, "What are you doing here?" Fmiao said, "Just now, Yuncheng came and brought a message for our second brother. He was waiting for a reply here." Xisi said, "Our second brother goes to school every day. How could you not know that? Why are you waiting for a reply?" Fmiao laughed and said, "I told him that, but he told me to tell you to decide."

paragraphs.original: 宝玉只顾拆开看那字儿，也不理会袭人这些话。袭人见他看那字儿，皱一回眉，又笑一笑儿，又摇摇头儿，后来光景竟不大耐烦起来。袭人等他看完了，问道：“是什么事情？”宝玉也不答言，把那帖子已经撕作几段。袭人见这般光景，也不便再问，便问宝玉吃了饭还看书不看。宝玉道：“可笑芸儿这孩子竟这样的混账！”袭人见他所答非所问，便微微的笑著问道：“到底是什么事？”宝玉道：“问他作什么！偺们吃饭罢。吃了饭歇著罢。心里闹的怪烦的。”说著，叫小丫头子点了一个火儿来，把那撕的帖儿烧了。

Yixuan saw that he was frowning one moment and laughing the next, and then getting more and more impatient. After he finished reading the letter, Yixuan asked him what it was about. Bao Yu didn't answer, but instead tore the letter into pieces. Yixuan, not wanting to push the issue, asked Bao Yu if he wanted to eat and rest. Bao Yu said that he thought it was ridiculous that Yuan was acting so silly. Yixuan, noticing that Bao Yu was not answering her question, asked him again. Bao Yu said, "Why should I answer you? Let's eat and rest. I'm feeling kind of restless." He then called for a servant to light a fire to burn the torn pieces of the letter.

paragraphs.original: 一时，小丫头们摆上饭来，宝玉只是怔怔的坐著。袭人连哄带怄，催著吃了一口儿饭，便搁下了，仍是闷闷的歪在床上。一时间，忽然掉下泪来。

In a moment, the little maids brought food, but the young man just sat there, lost in thought. paragraphs.original: 此时袭人麝月都摸不著头脑。麝月道：“好好儿的，这又是为什么？都是什么芸儿雨儿的！不知什么事，弄了这么个浪帖子来，惹的这么傻了的似的，哭一会子，笑一会子。要天长日久闹起这闷葫芦来，可叫人怎么受呢！”说著，竟伤起心来。袭人旁边由不得要笑，便劝道：“好妹妹，你也别怄人了。他一个人就够受了，你又这么著。他那帖子上的事，难道与你相干？”麝月道：“你混说起来了。知道他帖儿上写的是什么混账话？你混往人身上扯。要那么说，他帖儿上只怕倒与你相干呢！”袭人还未答言，只听宝玉在床上扑哧的一声笑了，爬起来，抖了抖衣裳，说：“偺们睡觉罢，别闹了。明日我还起早念书呢。”说著，便躺下睡了。一宿无话。
paragraphs.english: 翻译：Shuxue didn't understand, saying, "Why is this? I guess they are just playing around and just making jokes." Xishi tried to comfort her a couple of times, but Shuxue kept mentioning something about Bao Yuyu and herself, so Xishi stopped talking. After Shuxue left, Bao Yuyu laughed in bed, put on his clothes, and said, "Let's go to bed, don't joke around anymore, and we have to get up early tomorrow to study." paragraphs.chinese: 麝月不解，说：“这又是为什么？我猜他们俩闹着玩的，只不过闹些玩笑。”袭人劝了两句，麝月又说宝玉跟自己有关，袭人不说话。麝月走后，宝玉在床上笑起来，穿上衣服，说：“睡觉吧，别闹了，明天还要早起念书呢。”说完，躺下睡了。这一夜没说别的。

paragraphs.original: 次日，宝玉起来梳洗了，便往家塾里去。走出院门，忽然想起，叫焙茗略等，急忙转身回来叫：“麝月姐姐呢？”麝月答应著出来问道：“怎么又回来了？”宝玉道：“今日芸儿要来了，告诉他别在这里闹。再闹，我就回老太太和老爷去了。”麝月答应了。宝玉才转身去了。刚往外走著，只见贾芸慌慌张张往里来。看见宝玉，连忙请安说：“叔叔大喜了！”那宝玉估量著是昨日那件事，便说道：“你也太冒失了！不管人心里有事没事，只管来搅。”贾芸陪笑道：“叔叔不信，只管瞧去。人都来了，在偺们大门口呢。”宝玉越发急了，说：“这是那里的话？”

Just then, someone shouted, "You people really don't know how to behave! This is not a place to make so much noise." Another person replied, "Who cares if the Lord has risen in rank? paragraphs.original: 宝玉听了，才知道是贾政升了郎中了，人来报喜的，心中自是甚喜。连忙要走时，贾芸赶著说道：“叔叔乐不乐？叔叔的亲事要再成了，不用说，是两层喜了。”宝玉红了脸，啐了一口，道：“呸！没趣儿的东西！还不快走呢。”贾芸把脸红了，道：“这有什么的？我看你老人家就不－－”宝玉沉著脸道：“就不什么？”贾芸未及说完，也不敢言语了。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉连忙来到家塾中，只见代儒笑著说道：“我才刚听见你老爷升了，你今日还来了么？”宝玉陪笑道：“过来见了太爷，好到老爷那边去。”代儒道：“今日不必来了，放你一天假罢。可不许回园子里玩去。你年纪不小了，虽不能办事，也当跟著你大哥他们学学才是。”
paragraphs.english: Baoyu arrived at the family school, and Mr. Dai laughed at him and said, "I just heard from your father that he has been promoted. Are you still coming today?" paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉来到家塾，代儒笑着对他说，才刚刚听说老爷升了官，今日还来吗。宝玉陪笑道，过去给太爷请安，再到老爷那边去。代儒说，今天不来了，给你放一天假，不准到园子里玩了。你年纪不小了，不能办事，也得跟你们哥哥学学。

paragraphs.original: 宝玉答应著回来。刚走到二门口，只见李贵走来迎著，旁边站住，笑道：“二爷来了么？奴才才要到学里请去。”宝玉笑道：“谁说的？”李贵道：“老太太才打发人到院里去找二爷。那边的姑娘们说，二爷学里去了。刚才老太太打发人出来，叫奴才去给二爷告几天假。听说还要唱戏贺喜呢。二爷就来了。”
paragraphs.english:
Translation:

Baoyu agreed and returned. As he was walking to the second gate, he saw Li Gui walking towards him and standing there, smiling and saying, "Are you here, Master Baoyu? The slave was just about to go to the school to invite you." Baoyu laughed and said, "Who said that?" Li Gui said, "Grandmother just sent someone to look for Master Baoyu in the courtyard. The ladies over there said Master Baoyu went to the school. Just now, grandmother sent someone out to tell the slave to give Master Baoyu a few days off. paragraphs.original: 宝玉此时喜的无话可说，忙给贾母道了喜，又给邢王二夫人道喜，一一见了众姐妹，便向黛玉笑道：“妹妹身体可大好了？”黛玉也微笑道：“大好了。听见说二哥哥身上也欠安，好了么？”宝玉道：“可不是？我那日夜里，忽然心里疼起来，这几天刚好些，就上学去了，也没能过去看妹妹。”黛玉不等他说完，早扭过头和探春说话去了。凤姐在地下站著笑道：“你两个那里像天天在一块儿的？倒像是客，有这么些套话！可是人说的‘相敬如宾’了。”说的大家都一笑。黛玉满脸飞红，又不好说，又不好不说，迟了一会儿，才说道：“你懂得什么！”众人越发笑了。

Bai Yu had no choice but to say, "I'll go out to ask about it." Grandma said, "Don't go outside. First, you might make fun of the people announcing the good news; second, your father is in a good mood today, and if he sees you, he might get angry." Bai Yu agreed and then came out.

paragraphs.original: 这里贾母因问凤姐：“谁说送戏的话？”凤姐道：“说是二舅舅那边说，后儿日子好，送一班新出的小戏儿给老太太、老爷、太太贺喜。”因又笑著说道：“不但日子好，还是好日子呢！后日还是－－”却瞅著黛玉笑。黛玉也微笑。王夫人因道：“可是呢，后日还是外甥女儿的好生日呢。”贾母想了一想，也笑道：“可见我如今老了，什么事都糊涂了。亏了有我这凤丫头，是我个‘给事中’。既这么著，很好。他舅舅家给他们贺喜，你舅舅家就给你做生日，岂不好呢？”说的大家都笑起来，说道：“老祖宗说句话儿都是上篇上论的，怎么怨得有这么大福气呢！”

Translation:

Jia Mother asked Feng Jie, "Who said we should send a play troupe?" Feng Jie replied, "They said it was the second uncle's house that said the day after tomorrow was a good day, and they would send a new play troupe to congratulate grandma, dad, and mom on their good luck." Feng Jie then gave a sideways glance at Lin Daiyu, who also smiled. Wang Fei said, "It's true that tomorrow is also the birthday of the second cousin's daughter." Jia Mother thought for a moment and laughed, "I can see now that I'm getting old and have become confused about everything. It's a good thing I have my 'treasurer,' Feng Jie. If this is the case, then it's wonderful. Since the second uncle's house is giving us a play troupe, why not have your uncle's house give you a birthday celebration as well?" This made everyone laugh and say, "Grandmother, everything you say is so wise and thoughtful. No wonder you have such good luck!"

For the day you have so often wished for, you deserve only the best. So let me remind you how much I value and cherish our friendship, and how much I love you. You are indeed my rock and my heart. Happy Birthday, my dear friend.

paragraphs.english: On this day, Lady Wang, Lady Xue, Lady Chu, Lady Xing, and岫烟 accompanied the Queen Mother for dinner, and the two empty tables were for her children to eat.

Daiyu looked carefully and didn't see Baoshi, so she asked why she wasn't coming over. Xueyami said: Baoshi was supposed to come, but because there was no one at home to watch the house, she didn't come. Daiyu blushed and said: Aunt Xue is there with her big sister now, why did you ask Baoshi to watch the house? Maybe she's afraid of too many people and doesn't want to come? I miss her a lot. Xueyami laughed and said: It's nice that you're thinking of her. She often thinks of you and your sisters. One day, I'll ask her to come and we can all talk together.

paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉留神一看，不见宝钗，就问她为什么不过来。薛姨妈说：宝钗本来该来的，只因家里没人看家，所以不来。黛玉不好意思的红着脸说：姨妈那里又添了大嫂子，怎么倒用宝姐姐看起家来？大约是他怕人多热闹，懒怠来罢？我倒怪想他的。薛姨妈笑道：难得你惦记他。他也常想你们姐儿们。过一天，我叫他来大家叙叙。

paragraphs.original: 说著，丫头们下来斟酒上菜，外面已开戏了。出场自然是一两出吉庆戏文。及至第三出，只见金童玉女，旗旛宝幢，引著一个霓裳羽衣的小旦，头上披著一条黑帕，唱了几句儿进去了。众皆不知。听见外面人说：“这是新打的蕊珠记里的‘冥升’。小旦扮的是嫦娥，前因堕落人寰，几乎给人为配；幸亏观音点化，他就未嫁而逝。此时升引月宫。不听见曲里头唱的：‘人间只道风情好，那知道秋月春花容易抛？几乎不把广寒宫忘却了！’”第四出是“吃糠”。第五出是“达摩带著徒弟过江回去”。正扮出些海市蜃楼，好不热闹。
paragraphs.english: At this moment, the maids had already poured the wine and served the dishes. Outside, the noise was deafening, with people singing celebratory opera and telling stories. When the third act was underway, a pair of celestial attendants carrying a banner led a woman wearing a flowered dress and a black flower on her head. They sang a few lines before disappearing inside. Everyone was confused by this. An outsider explained, "This is a new adaptation of The Record of the Spirits in the Jade Palace, called 'Ascension of the Dead'. It's about a story of Chang'e. Chang'e once stole the elixir of immortality from the West Queen Mother. After ascending to heaven, she was discovered by the Jade Emperor and was punished by being sent to marry a mortal. Thankfully, with the guidance of the Bodhisattva of Mercy, Chang'e avoided marriage. Now, she's ascending to the Moon Palace, and the lines she sang were, 'I thought the world was beautiful, but I didn't know that the changing of the seasons was so fleeting? I almost forgot the Moon Palace!'" The fourth act was titled 'Eating Rice Husks' and the fifth was 'Dharma Preacher Bringing His Disciples Back Home from the River'. In the midst of the performance, there was a breathtaking view, almost like an apparition of the sea.
paragraphs.chinese: 这时，丫鬟们已斟酒上菜。外面人声鼎沸，有唱吉庆戏文的，也有唱评话的。唱到第三出时，只见金童玉女，拿着锦旗，引著一个穿着花衣裳、头戴黑花的女角，唱了唱，就进去了。众人都不解其意。外面人说：“这是新编的《蕊珠记》里的‘冥升’，唱的是一段嫦娥的故事。说嫦娥曾偷吃了西王母的灵药，上天之后，被玉帝发现，罚她下凡去给人做媳妇。幸亏观音菩萨指点，嫦娥才没嫁。现在她升入月宫，唱的几句词是：‘只道人间风景好，那知道秋月春花容易抛？几乎把广寒宫忘掉！’”第四出是《吃糠》，第五出是《达摩带著徒弟过江回乡》。正唱着的，有海市蜃楼一般的美景，好看极了。

paragraphs.original: 众人正在高兴时，忽见薛家的人满头汗闯进来，向薛蝌说道：“二爷快回去！一并里头回明太太，也请回去！家里有要紧事。”薛蝌道：什么事？”家人道：“家去说罢。”薛蝌也不及告辞，就走了。薛姨妈见里头丫头传进话去，更骇得面如土色，即忙起身，带著宝琴，别了一声，即刻上车回去了。弄得内外愕然。贾母道：“偺们这里打发人跟过去听听，到底是什么事，大家都关切的。”众人答应了个“是”。
paragraphs.english: Everyone was in high spirits when suddenly someone from the Xu family ran in, sweating profusely, and said to Xu Ke, "You must go back quickly! Please inform the old lady and yourself. There is urgent business at home." Xu Ke asked, "What happened?" The family replied, "Come back and we will tell you." Xu Ke did not have time to say goodbye and left. When he heard that Xu Ke had returned, Xu Mom was so frightened that she turned pale, quickly stood up, accompanied by Ba Qian, and followed the person back home. It caused a great stir inside and out. Jia Mo said, "We will send someone to follow and find out what happened. Everyone is concerned." The others agreed, "Yes."
paragraphs.chinese: 众人都正高兴，忽然薛家的人满头大汗地闯进来，对薛蝌说：“二爷快回去！赶快回老太太，也请回去！家里有要紧事。”薛蝌问：“什么事？”家人说：“回家再说。”薛蝌也来不及告辞就走了。薛姨妈听说薛蝌回家，吓得面如土色，赶紧起身，带着宝琴，跟了人一起回去。弄得里里外外都很惊讶。贾母道：“我们这里派人跟过去听听，到底什么事，大家都很关切。”众人答应了“是”。

paragraphs.original: 不说贾府依旧唱戏。单说薛姨妈回去，只见有两个衙役站在二门口，几个当铺里夥计陪著，说：“太太回来，自有道理。”正说著，薛姨妈已进来了。那衙役们见跟从著许多男妇簇拥著一位老太太，便知是薛蟠之母。看见这个势派，也不敢怎么，只得垂手侍立，让薛姨妈进去了。那薛姨妈走到厅房后面，早听见有人大哭，却是金桂。薛姨妈赶忙走来，只见宝钗迎出来，满面泪痕，见了薛姨妈，便道：“妈妈听见了，先别著急，办事要紧！”

paragraphs.original: 薛姨妈同宝钗进了屋子，因为头里进门时，已经走著听见家人说了，吓的战战兢兢的了，一面哭著，因问：“到底是合谁－－”只见家人回道：“太太此时且不必问那些底细。凭他是谁，打死了总是要偿命的，且商量怎么办才好。”薛姨妈哭著出来道：“还有什么商议！”家人道：“依小的们的主见：今夜打点银两，同著二爷赶去，和大爷见了面，就在那里访一个有斟酌的刀笔先生，许他些银子，先把死罪撕掳开，回来再求贾府去上司衙门说情。还有外面的衙役，太太先拿出几两银子来打发了他们，我们好赶著办事。”薛姨妈道：“你找著那家子，许他发送银子，再给他些养济银子。原告不追，事情就缓了。”宝钗在帘内说道：“妈妈，使不得。这些事，越给钱越闹的凶，倒是刚才小厮说的话是。”薛姨妈又哭道：“我也不要命了！赶到那里见他一面，同他死在一处就完了！”宝钗急的一面劝，一面在帘子里叫人：“快同二爷办去罢。”丫头们搀进薛姨妈来，薛蝌才往外走。宝钗道：“有什么信，打发人即刻寄了来，你们只管在外头照料。”薛蝌答应著去了，这宝钗方劝薛姨妈。

Xue Yimei cried as she came out of the house, "What more can we discuss!" paragraphs.original: 那里金桂趁空儿抓住香菱，又和他嚷道：“平常你们只管夸他们家里打死了人，一点事也没有，就进京来了的，如今撺掇的真打死人了。平日里只讲有钱，有势，有好亲戚，这时候我看著也是吓的慌手慌脚的了。大爷明儿有个好歹儿不能回来时，你们各自干你们的去了，撂下我一个人受罪！”说著，又大哭起来。
paragraphs.english: Back then, when the golden chrysanthemum took the opportunity to grab Xiang Ling, she yelled at her, "You guys always praise how their family killed someone and nothing happened, and now they really killed someone after being pushed into it. You always talk about having money, power, and good relatives, but now I see that even they're scared and don't know what to do. If something bad happens to the master tomorrow and he can't come back, you all will go your separate ways, leaving me to suffer punishment!" She then burst into tears.

paragraphs.original: 这里薛姨妈听见，越发气的发昏，宝钗急的没法。正闹著，只见贾府中王夫人早打发大丫头过来打听来了。宝钗虽心知自己是贾府的人了，一则尚未提明，二则事急之时，只得向那大丫头道：“此时事情头尾尚未明白，就只听见说我哥哥在外头打死了人，被县里拿了去了。也不知怎么定罪呢。刚才二爷才去打听去了。一半日得了准信，赶著就给那边太太送信去。你先回去道谢太太惦记著，底下我们还有多少仰仗那边爷们的地方呢。”那丫头答应著去了。
paragraphs.english: Baoshai, although she knew that she was from the Jia family, first of all she did not want to make it clear yet, and secondly, when things were in a hurry, she could only talk to the big maid, saying, "At the moment, we don't know the whole story, all we know is that my brother was caught outside and killed someone, and the county government arrested him. We don't know what the punishment will be. My cousin went to find out just now. I'll send him word as soon as I hear back, and then we'll send word to the grandmother. Please tell her thank you for worrying about us, and there are still many things we need their help with." The maid nodded and went off.

paragraphs.english: 薛姨妈和宝钗在家里，感到很迷茫。过了两天，只见一个小厮回来，拿着一封信，交给了小丫头拿进来。宝钗拆开信来看，信里写着：
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈和宝钗在家，抓摸不着。过了两天，只见小厮回来，拿着一封信，交给小丫头拿进来。宝钗拆开信来看，信里写着：

paragraphs.original: 大哥人命是误伤，不是故杀。今早用蝌出名，补了一张呈纸进去，尚未批出。大哥前头口供甚是不好。待此纸批准后，再录一堂，能够翻供得好，便可得生了。快向当铺内再取银五百两来使用，千万莫迟！并请太太放心。馀事问小厮。
paragraphs.english:
英文翻译:
My brother's life was an accident, not an intentional killing. Yesterday morning, I became famous with frog eggs, and filed a report, but it has not yet been approved. My brother's previous confession is not good. Once this paper is approved, another statement can be made, and if it can be successfully retracted, he can live. Go to the pawnshop to get another five hundred taels of silver, and don't be late! Please also let my lady rest assured. Ask the manservant for the other matters.
paragraphs.chinese: 哥哥人命是误伤，不是故意杀人的。昨天早上，我用蝌蚪丸出名，补了一张呈文进去，还没有批下来。哥哥你前头的口供不好。等这纸批下来，再录一堂，能翻供得好，就可以活了。赶快去当铺里再取五百两银子来用，千万不能迟！还请太太放心。别的事问小厮。

paragraphs.original: 宝钗看了，一一念给薛姨妈听了。薛姨妈拭著眼泪，说道：“这么看起来，竟是死活不定了！”宝钗道：“妈妈先别伤心，等著叫进小厮来问明了再说。”一面打发小丫头把小厮叫进来。薛姨妈便问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细说与我听听。”小厮道：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”
paragraphs.english:
薛姨妈听了，忙问宝钗道：“宝琴姐姐是死了？”宝钗含泪说：“阿弥陀佛，还好。我刚才看见他下山去了，他哥哥被虎吃了，姑娘已死，因此吓坏了。”薛姨妈又问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细细说与我听听。”小厮说：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”
Translation:
薛姨妈 listened and asked Baichao, "Is Lady Boqian dead?" Baichao cried, "Amitabha, good. I just saw her going down the mountain. Her brother was eaten by a tiger, and the lady died, so she was scared." Then, Xueyima asked the footman, "Tell me about the elder son's story in detail." The footman said, "That night, I heard the elder son and the second son talking, which scared me out of my wits."
paragraphs.chinese: 薛姨妈听了，忙问宝钗道：“宝琴姐姐是死了？”宝钗含泪说：“阿弥陀佛，还好。我刚才看见他下山去了，他哥哥被虎吃了，姑娘已死，因此吓坏了。”薛姨妈又问小厮道：“你把大爷的事细细说与我听听。”小厮说：“我那一天晚上，听见大爷和二爷说的，把我唬糊涂了。”

paragraphs.original: 未知小厮说出什么话来，下回分解。
paragraphs.english:
Decompose the next time.

In this translation, "分解" (fēnjiě) is used, which means "to decompose" or "to analyze." The phrase "下回分解" (xià huí fēnjiě) translates to "decompose the next time" or "next time, we will analyze it." The speaker is suggesting that they will provide further information or analysis in the future.
paragraphs.chinese: 下回分解。
